Class OpenExchangeRatesService

public class OpenExchangeRatesService

Description: Methods to get currency conversion rates from Open Exchange Rates References:

Changes

02/03/2024 Initial version. 03/09/2024 Saves the latest conversion rates timestamp to the DatedConversionRatesSettings__c object.

Members

  Modifiers and Type Name Description

Class to parse the response from the Open Exchange Rates API service

saveConversionRates(Date conversionRatesDate)

Methods

public static OpenExchangeRatesService.ConversionRatesResult getHistoricalConversionRates(Date conversionRatesDate)

Get the historical conversion rates from the Open Exchange Rates API service for the given date

Parameters:
    conversionRatesDate – Date: The date for which to get the conversion rates.

Returns:
    ConversionRatesResult: The result of the HTTP request with the conversion rates.

public static OpenExchangeRatesService.ConversionRatesResult getLatestConversionRates()

Get the latest conversion rates from the Open Exchange Rates API service

Returns:
    ConversionRatesResult: The result of the HTTP request with the conversion rates.

public static void saveConversionRates(Date conversionRatesDate)

Get the conversion rates for the specified date from the Open Exchange Rates service and save them to the DatedConversionRate__c object.

Parameters:
    conversionRatesDate – Date: The date for which to get the conversion rates.

public static void saveLatestConversionRates()

Get the latest conversion rates from the Open Exchange Rates service and save them to the DatedConversionRate__c object.
